data.name: bind
data.value: Binds a key with a command.

data.name: changelevel
data.value: Changes the map.

data.name: cl_ask_blacklist_opt_out
data.value: 0/1 - turns question whether to blacklist a server after leaving after a short amount of time off/on.

data.name: cl_ask_favorite_opt_out
data.value: 0/1 - turns question whether to favorite a server after leaving after a longer amount of time off/on.

data.name: cl_autoreload
data.value: 0/1 - turns automatic reloading off/on.

data.name: cl_autorezoom
data.value: 0/1 - turns Sniper Rifle re-zoom off/on.

data.name: cl_burninggibs
data.value: 0/1 - burning gibs off/on.

data.name: cl_crosshair_file
data.value: Sets crosshair picture. "" is standard-crosshairs.

data.name: cl_drawhud
data.value: Hides/shows the HUD - sv_cheats 1 required.

data.name: cl_flipviewmodels
data.value: 0/1 - sets viewmodels normal/inverted(left-handed) - does not work while connected to a server.

data.name: cl_gameserver_create_identity
data.value: Create identity for dedicated server.

data.name: cl_gameserver_list
data.value: List all of the game server accounts owned by the currently logged in Steam account.

data.name: cl_interp
data.value: Sets how far character models are interpolated (drawn away from their actual position) in the world, a good standard value for hitscan weapons is 0.034.

data.name: cl_new_impact_effects
data.value: 0/1 - turns new, better looking impact effects off/on, most noticeable on glass.

data.name: cl_ragdoll_collide
data.value: 0/1 - turns ragdoll collisions on/off.

data.name: cl_ragdoll_fade_time
data.value: Sets time until ragdolls disappear.

data.name: cl_showbackpackrarities
data.value: 0/1 - turns color-coded items in backpack off/on.

data.name: cl_showfps
data.value: 0/1/2 - shows framerate (off/real-time/rounded).

data.name: cl_showpos
data.value: 0/1 - shows the map coordinates and movement speed of the player.

data.name: cl_spec_carrieditems
data.value: Shows non-standard items being carried by player you're spectating.

data.name: cl_yawspeed
data.value: Sets the speed at which your character turns when using the +left and +right commands.

data.name: cvarlist
data.value: View complete cvar list.

data.name: demoui
data.value: Brings up a toolbox for replays (Shift+F2 will also bring up the tool box).

data.name: dropitem
data.value: Drop the flag or intelligence.

data.name: endmovie
data.value: Stops source recorder.

data.name: exec
data.value: Execute config file.

data.name: explode
data.value: Commit suicide by exploding into gibs.

data.name: find
data.value: F search function that displays all commands with searched term.

data.name: fov_desired
data.value: 70-90 - set desired field of view (higher values show more of the battlefield at the cost of fps).

data.name: host_framerate
data.value: Tells the source recorder to record at a constant framerate.

data.name: host_timescale
data.value: Use in conjunction with host_framerate to produce a smooth video output.

data.name: hud_combattext
data.value: 0/1 - turns the damage text above enemies off/on.

data.name: hud_combattext_healing
data.value: Display the amount of healing done per second.

data.name: hud_reloadscheme
data.value: Use this to fix various HUD-color errors or lingering Crit-effects.

data.name: hurtme
data.value: Deals given amount of damage (can be negative for extra health). Requires sv_cheats 1.

data.name: jointeam
data.value: Force team (red/blue/auto/spectator). Use this if you are stuck in "dead spectator" mode when too many people attempt to join a team at the same time.

data.name: jpeg
data.value: Take a jpeg screenshot.

data.name: kill
data.value: Commit suicide.

data.name: map
data.value: Changes the map and restarts the server.

data.name: maps
data.value: Display list of maps.

data.name: mp_autoteambalance
data.value: Cvar for automatic team balancing.

data.name: mp_disable_respawn_times
data.value: Cvar for respawn times.

data.name: mp_idledealmethod
data.value: Cvar for managing idle players.

data.name: mp_restartgame
data.value: Restarts the round and resets the round time.

data.name: mp_scrambleteams
data.value: Scramble the teams and restart the game.

data.name: mp_scrambleteams_auto
data.value: Server will automatically scramble the teams if criteria met. Only works on dedicated servers.

data.name: mp_scrambleteams_auto_windifference
data.value: Number of round wins a team must lead by in order to trigger an auto scramble.

data.name: mp_teams_unbalance_limit
data.value: Cvar for team force balance.

data.name: mp_timelimit
data.value: Cvar for map timelimit.

data.name: mp_usehwmmodels
data.value: 1 - makes use of the high-polygon class models used in the 'Meet the Team' videos.

data.name: mp_usehwmvcds
data.value: 1 - makes use of the high-polygon class models used in the 'Meet the Team' videos.

data.name: mp_waitingforplayerscancel
data.value: 1 - cancels "waiting for players..." time.

data.name: net_graph
data.value: Depending on the input value, different amounts of information will be shown such as ping, fps, lerp, packet loss, etc.

data.name: nextlevel
data.value: Sets the next map to be played.

data.name: rcon
data.value: Executes an rcon command.

data.name: rcon_address
data.value: Sets the server address to send rcon commands to (if not set, console sends the command to the server that the player is currently in instead).

data.name: rcon_password
data.value: Gives player access to rcon commands.

data.name: record
data.value: Records a demo.

data.name: restart
data.value: Restarts the current server.

data.name: retry
data.value: Retry connection to last server.

data.name: r_drawviewmodel
data.value: Turns viewmodels on and off.

data.name: startmovie
data.value: Opens up the source recorder during demo play back and allows for high quality avi format recording.

data.name: status
data.value: Display map and connection status.

data.name: stop
data.value: Stops the recording of a demo.

data.name: sv_allow_votes
data.value: Allow voting?

data.name: sv_cheats
data.value: 0/1 - turns cheats off/on.

data.name: sv_lan
data.value: Cvar for local area network.

data.name: sv_pure
data.value: Cvar for managing custom content.

data.name: sv_use_steam_voice
data.value: Use new voice codec instead of old.

data.name: sv_vote_allow_specators
data.value: Allow spectators to vote?

data.name: sv_vote_failure_timer
data.value: A vote that fails cannot be voted on again during this period.

data.name: sv_vote_issue_changelevel_allowed
data.value: Allow votes to change levels?

data.name: sv_vote_issue_kick_allowed
data.value: Allow votes to kick players from the server?

data.name: sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_allowed
data.value: Allow votes to set the next level?

data.name: sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_allowextend
data.value: Allow votes to extend the current map?

data.name: sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_choicesmode
data.value: Present players with a list of maps with the lowest playtimes to choose from?

data.name: sv_vote_issue_nextlevel_prevent_change
data.value: Prevent voting on the next level if one has already been set.

data.name: sv_vote_issue_restart_game_allowed
data.value: Allow votes to restart the game?

data.name: sv_vote_issue_scramble_teams_allowed
data.value: Allow votes to scramble the teams?

data.name: sv_vote_kick_ban_duration
data.value: How long should a kick vote ban someone from the server? (in minutes)

data.name: tf_allow_player_use
data.value: 0/1 - disallows/allows the +use command on a server, useful for some custom maps, standard is 0.

data.name: tf_arena_max_streak
data.value: Teams will be scrambled if one team reaches this streak.

data.name: tf_damage_disablespread
data.value: 0/1 - turns random damage-spread (+-10%) for weapons off/on.

data.name: tf_dingalingaling
data.value: 0/1 - turns weapon hit sound off/on.

data.name: tf_dingaling_pitchmaxdmg
data.value: Sets the pitch when doing maximum damage with your weapon, a lower pitch is recommended in most cases, standard is 100.

data.name: tf_dingaling_pitchmindmg
data.value: Sets the pitch when doing minimum damage with your weapon, a higher pitch is recommended in most cases, standard is 100.

data.name: tf_dingaling_volume
data.value: Sets the volume for hit sounds, standard is 1.00.

data.name: tf_dingaling_wav_override
data.value: Allows using a custom hit sound. No longer used. To use a custom hit sound, rename your sound file "hitsound.wav", and place it in the "tf/sound/ui/" folder.

data.name: tf_forced_holiday
data.value: 0/2/3 - enables holiday mode (0 = default; 2 = halloween; 3 = birthday).

data.name: tf_medieval
data.value: 0/1 - enables Medieval mode on the server, requires map change to take effect.

data.name: tf_medieval_autorp
data.value: 0/1 - enables/disables automatic medieval-style text modification in the chat box.

data.name: tf_medieval_thirdperson
data.value: 0/1 - toggles third person view during Medieval mode.

data.name: tf_medigun_autoheal
data.value: 0/1 - turns automatic healing without holding the left mouse button off/on.

data.name: tf_overtime_nag
data.value: 0/1 - turns endless shouting of "OVERTIME!" in Overtime off/on.

data.name: tf_server_identity_account_id
data.value: Owner's SteamID.

data.name: tf_server_identity_token
data.value: Owner's identity token.

data.name: tf_use_fixed_weaponspreads
data.value: 0/1 - turns fixed, consistent spread for weapons like Shotgun, Scattergun and Shortstop off/on.

data.name: tf_weapon_criticals
data.value: 0/1 - turns random criticals off/on.

data.name: unbind
data.value: Unbinds a key.

data.name: use
data.value: Used to equip the specified weapon or execute action.

data.name: viewmodel_fov
data.value: Sets distance in which your weapons are drawn, higher values show more of the weapon and arms but may show missing parts.

data.name: zoom_sensitivity_ratio
data.value: Sets the ratio of sensitivity while zoomed in with the Sniper Rifle with accordance to actual sensitivity.

data.name: sv_bounce
data.value: Bounce multiplier for when physically simulated objects collide with other objects.

data.name: sv_max_connects_sec
data.value: Maximum connections per second to respond to from a single IP address.

data.name: sv_max_connects_sec_global
data.value: Maximum connections per second to respond to from anywhere.

data.name: sv_max_connects_window
data.value: Window over which to average connections per second averages.

data.name: sv_allowdownload
data.value: Allow clients to download files.

data.name: sv_allowupload
data.value: Allow clients to upload customizations files.

data.name: sv_allow_color_correction
data.value: Allow or disallow clients to use color correction on this server.

data.name: sv_allow_voice_from_file
data.value: Allow or disallow clients from using voice_inputfromfile on this server.

data.name: sv_allow_wait_command
data.value: Allow or disallow the wait command on clients connected to this server.

data.name: sv_alltalk
data.value: Players can hear all other players, no team restrictions.

data.name: sv_alternateticks
data.value: If set, server only simulates entities on even numbered ticks.

data.name: sv_autosave
data.value: Set to 1 to autosave game on level transition. Does not affect autosave triggers.

data.name: sv_benchmark_autovprofrecord
data.value: If running a benchmark and this is set, it will record a vprof file over the duration of the benchmark with filename benchmark.

data.name: sv_benchmark_force_start
data.value: Force start the benchmark. This is only for debugging. It's better to set sv_benchmark to 1 and restart the level.

data.name: sv_benchmark_freeroam
data.value: Allow the local player to move freely in the benchmark. Only used for debugging.

data.name: sv_benchmark_numticks
data.value: If > 0, then it only runs the benchmark for this # of ticks.

data.name: sv_bonus_challenge
data.value: Set to values other than 0 to select a bonus map challenge type.

data.name: sv_bonus_map_challenge_update
data.value: Updates a bonus map challenge score.

data.name: sv_bonus_map_complete
data.value: Completes a bonus map.

data.name: sv_bonus_map_unlock
data.value: Locks a bonus map.

data.name: sv_cacheencodedents
data.value: If set to 1, does an optimization to prevent extra SendTable_Encode calls.

data.name: sv_clearhinthistory
data.value: Clear memory of server side hints displayed to the player.

data.name: sv_client_cmdrate_difference
data.value: cl_cmdrate is moved to within sv_client_cmdrate_difference units of cl_updaterate before it is clamped between sv_mincmdrate and sv_maxcmdrate.

data.name: sv_client_max_interp_ratio
data.value: This can be used to limit the value of cl_interp_ratio for connected clients (only while they are connected).

data.name: sv_client_min_interp_ratio
data.value: This can be used to limit the value of cl_interp_ratio for connected clients (only while they are connected).

data.name: sv_client_predict
data.value: This can be used to force the value of cl_predict for connected clients (only while they are connected).

data.name: sv_clockcorrection_msecs
data.value: The server tries to keep each player's m_nTickBase withing this many msecs of the server absolute tickcount.

data.name: sv_consistency
data.value: Whether the server enforces file consistency for critical files.

data.name: sv_contact
data.value: Contact email for server sysop.

data.name: sv_debugmanualmode
data.value: Make sure entities correctly report whether or not their network data has changed.

data.name: sv_debugtempentities
data.value: Show temp entity bandwidth usage.

data.name: sv_debug_player_use
data.value: Visualizes +use logic. Green cross=trace success, Red cross=trace too far, Green box=radius success.

data.name: sv_deltaprint
data.value: Print accumulated CalcDelta profiling data (only if sv_deltatime is on).

data.name: sv_deltatime
data.value: Enable profiling of CalcDelta calls.

data.name: sv_disable_querycache
data.value: Debug - disable trace query cache.

data.name: sv_downloadurl
data.value: Location from which clients can download missing files.

data.name: sv_enableoldqueries
data.value: Enable support for old style (HL1) server queries.

data.name: sv_filterban
data.value: Set packet filtering by IP mode.

data.name: sv_forcepreload
data.value: Force server side preloading.

data.name: sv_gravity
data.value: World gravity.

data.name: sv_logbans
data.value: Log server bans in the server logs.

data.name: sv_logblocks
data.value: If true when log when a query is blocked (can cause very large log files).

data.name: sv_logecho
data.value: Echo log information to the console.

data.name: sv_logfile
data.value: Log server information in the log file.

data.name: sv_logflush
data.value: Flush the log file to disk on each write (slow).

data.name: sv_logsdir
data.value: Folder in the game directory where server logs will be stored.

data.name: sv_logsecret
data.value: If set then include this secret when doing UDP logging (will use 0x53 as packet type, not usual 0x52).

data.name: sv_log_onefile
data.value: Log server information to only one file.

data.name: sv_lowedict_action
data.value: 0 - no action, 1 - warn to log file, 2 - attempt to restart the game, if applicable, 3 - restart the map, 4 - go to the next map.

data.name: sv_lowedict_threshold
data.value: When only this many edicts are free, take the action specified by sv_lowedict_action.

data.name: sv_master_share_game_socket
data.value: Use the game's socket to communicate to the master server.

data.name: sv_maxcmdrate
data.value: (If sv_mincmdrate is > 0), this sets the maximum value for cl_cmdrate.

data.name: sv_maxrate
data.value: Max bandwidth rate allowed on server, 0 == unlimited.

data.name: sv_maxreplay
data.value: Maximum replay time in seconds.

data.name: sv_maxroutable
data.value: Server upper bound on net_maxroutable that a client can use.

data.name: sv_maxupdaterate
data.value: Maximum updates per second that the server will allow.

data.name: sv_max_queries_sec
data.value: Maximum queries per second to respond to from a single IP address.

data.name: sv_max_queries_sec_global
data.value: Maximum queries per second to respond to from anywhere.

data.name: sv_max_queries_window
data.value: Window over which to average queries per second averages.

data.name: sv_max_usercmd_future_ticks
data.value: Prevents clients from running usercmds too far in the future. Prevents speed hacks.

data.name: sv_memlimit
data.value: If set, whenever the server is empty, if the total memory used by the server is greater than this # of megabytes.

data.name: sv_mincmdrate
data.value: This sets the minimum value for cl_cmdrate. 0 == unlimited.

data.name: sv_minrate
data.value: Min bandwidth rate allowed on server, 0 == unlimited.

data.name: sv_minupdaterate
data.value: Minimum updates per second that the server will allow.

data.name: sv_namechange_cooldown_seconds
data.value: When a client name change is received, wait N seconds allowing another name change.

data.name: sv_netspike_on_reliable_snapshot_overflow
data.value: If nonzero, the server will dump a netspike trace if a client is dropped due to reliable snapshot overflow.

data.name: sv_noclipduringpause
data.value: If cheats are enabled, then you can noclip with the game paused (for doing screenshots, etc.).

data.name: sv_npc_talker_maxdist
data.value: NPCs over this distance from the player won't attempt to speak.

data.name: sv_password
data.value: Server password for entry into multiplayer games.

data.name: sv_pausable
data.value: Is the server pausable.

data.name: sv_playerperfhistorycount
data.value: Number of samples to maintain in player perf history.

data.name: sv_precacheinfo
data.value: Show precache info.

data.name: sv_pure_kick_clients
data.value: If set to 1, the server will kick clients with mismatching files. Otherwise, it will issue a warning to the client.

data.name: sv_pure_trace
data.value: If set to 1, the server will print a message whenever a client is verifying a CRC for a file.

data.name: sv_pvsskipanimation
data.value: Skips SetupBones when npc's are outside the PVS.

data.name: sv_querycache_stats
data.value: Display status of the query cache (client only).

data.name: sv_rcon_banpenalty
data.value: Number of minutes to ban users who fail rcon authentication.

data.name: sv_rcon_log
data.value: Enable/disable rcon logging.

data.name: sv_rcon_maxfailures
data.value: Max number of times a user can fail rcon authentication before being banned.

data.name: sv_rcon_maxpacketbans
data.value: Ban IPs for sending RCON packets exceeding the value specified in sv_rcon_maxpacketsize.

data.name: sv_rcon_maxpacketsize
data.value: The maximum number of bytes to allow in a command packet.

data.name: sv_rcon_minfailures
data.value: Number of times a user can fail rcon authentication in sv_rcon_minfailuretime before being banned.

data.name: sv_rcon_minfailuretime
data.value: Number of seconds to track failed rcon authentications.

data.name: sv_region
data.value: The region of the world to report this server in.

data.name: sv_restrict_aspect_ratio_fov
data.value: This can be used to limit the effective FOV of users using wide-screen resolutions with aspect ratios wider than 1.85:1.

data.name: sv_showladders
data.value: Show bbox and dismount points for all ladders.

data.name: sv_showlagcompensation
data.value: Show lag compensated hitboxes whenever a player is lag compensated.

data.name: sv_shutdown
data.value: Sets the server to shutdown next time it's empty.

data.name: sv_skyname
data.value: Current name of the skybox texture.

data.name: sv_soundemitter_trace
data.value: Show all EmitSound calls including their symbolic name and the actual wave file they resolved to.

data.name: sv_stats
data.value: Collect CPU usage stats.

data.name: sv_steamblockingcheck
data.value: Check each new player for Steam blocking compatibility.

data.name: sv_steamgroup
data.value: The ID of the steam group that this server belongs to. You can find your group's ID on the admin profile page.

data.name: sv_strict_notarget
data.value: If set, notarget will cause entities to never think they are in the pvs.

data.name: sv_tags
data.value: Server tags. Used to provide extra information to clients when they're browsing for servers. Separate tags with a comma.

data.name: sv_test_scripted_sequences
data.value: Tests for scripted sequences that are embedded in the world.

data.name: sv_thinktimecheck
data.value: Check for thinktimes all on same timestamp.

data.name: sv_timeout
data.value: After this many seconds without a message from a client, the client is dropped.

data.name: sv_turbophysics
data.value: Turns on turbo physics.

data.name: sv_unlockedchapters
data.value: Highest unlocked game chapter.

data.name: sv_visiblemaxplayers
data.value: Overrides the max players reported to prospective clients.

data.name: sv_voicecodec
data.value: Specifies which voice codec DLL to use in a game. Set to the name of the DLL without the extension.

data.name: sv_vote_allow_spectators
data.value: Allow spectators to vote?

data.name: sv_vote_failure_timer_mvm
data.value: A vote that fails in MvM cannot be re-submitted for this long.

data.name: sv_vote_issue_changelevel_allowed_mvm
data.value: Can people hold votes to change levels in MvM?

data.name: sv_vote_issue_kick_allowed_mvm
data.value: Can people hold votes to kick players from the server in MvM?

data.name: sv_vote_issue_mvm_challenge_allowed
data.value: Can people hold votes to set the challenge level?

data.name: sv_vote_ui_hide_disabled_issues
data.value: Suppress listing of disabled issues in the vote setup screen.

data.name: tf_allow_taunt_switch
data.value: 0 - players are not allowed to switch weapons while taunting, 1 - players can switch weapons at the start of a taunt.

data.name: tf_always_deathanim
data.value: Force death anims to always play.

data.name: tf_always_loser
data.value: Force loserstate to true.

data.name: tf_arena_first_blood
data.value: Rewards the first player to get a kill each round.

data.name: tf_arena_override_cap_enable_time
data.value: Overrides the time (in seconds) it takes for the capture point to become enable, -1 uses the level designer specified time.

data.name: tf_arena_preround_time
data.value: Length of the Pre-Round time.

data.name: tf_arena_round_time
data.value: Arena round time.

data.name: tf_arena_use_queue
data.value: Enables the spectator queue system for Arena.

data.name: tf_backstab_detection_method
data.value: Which detection method to use for backstabs (0 = old, 1 = new).

data.name: tf_birthday
data.value: Turn on birthday mode.

data.name: tf_birthday_ball_chance
data.value: Percent chance of a birthday beach ball spawning at each round start.

data.name: tf_bot_add
data.value: Add a bot.

data.name: tf_bot_ammo_search_range
data.value: How far bots will search to find ammo around them.

data.name: tf_bot_arrow_elevation_rate
data.value: When firing arrows at far away targets, this is the degree/range slope to raise our aim.

data.name: tf_bot_auto_vacate
data.value: If nonzero, bots will automatically leave to make room for human players.

data.name: tf_bot_ballistic_elevation_rate
data.value: When lobbing grenades at far away targets, this is the degree/range slope to raise our aim.

data.name: tf_bot_capture_seek_and_destroy_max_duration
data.value: If a capturing bot decides to go hunting, this is the max duration he will hunt for before reconsidering.

data.name: tf_bot_capture_seek_and_destroy_min_duration
data.value: If a capturing bot decides to go hunting, this is the min duration he will hunt for before reconsidering.

data.name: tf_bot_choose_target_interval
data.value: How often, in seconds, a TFBot can reselect his target.

data.name: tf_bot_debug_stuck_log
data.value: Given a server logfile, visually display bot stuck locations.

data.name: tf_bot_defend_owned_point_percent
data.value: Stay on the contested point we own until enemy cap percent falls below this.

data.name: tf_bot_defense_must_defend_time
data.value: If timer is less than this, bots will stay near point and guard.

data.name: tf_bot_difficulty
data.value: Defines the skill of bots joining the game. Values are: 0=easy, 1=normal, 2=hard, 3=expert.

data.name: tf_bot_engineer_exit_near_sentry_range
data.value: Maximum travel distance between a bot's Sentry gun and its Teleporter Exit.

data.name: tf_bot_engineer_max_sentry_travel_distance_to_point
data.value: Maximum travel distance between a bot's Sentry gun and the currently contested point.

data.name: tf_bot_engineer_retaliate_range
data.value: If attacker who destroyed sentry is closer than this, attack. Otherwise, retreat.

data.name: tf_bot_fetch_lost_flag_time
data.value: How long busy TFBots will ignore the dropped flag before they give up what they are doing and go after it.

data.name: tf_bot_fire_weapon_allowed
data.value: If zero, TFBots will not pull the trigger of their weapons (but will act like they did).

data.name: tf_bot_flag_kill_on_touch
data.value: If nonzero, any bot that picks up the flag dies. For testing.

data.name: tf_bot_force_class
data.value: If set to a class name, all TFBots will respawn as that class.

data.name: tf_bot_force_jump
data.value: Force bots to continuously jump.

data.name: tf_bot_join_after_player
data.value: If nonzero, bots wait until a player joins before entering the game.

data.name: tf_bot_kick
data.value: Remove a TFBot by name, or all bots ('all').

data.name: tf_bot_kill
data.value: Kill a TFBot by name, or all bots ('all').

data.name: tf_bot_max_point_defend_range
data.value: How far (in travel distance) from the point defending bots will take up positions.

data.name: tf_bot_max_setup_gate_defend_range
data.value: How far from the setup gate(s) defending bots can take up positions.

data.name: tf_bot_max_teleport_entrance_travel

data.name: bot_quota_mode
data.value: Determines the type of quota. Allowed values: 'normal', 'fill', and 'match'. If 'fill', the server will adjust bots to keep N players in the game, where N is bot_quota. If 'match', the server will maintain a 1:N ratio of humans to bots, where N is bot_quota.

data.name: cash_player_damage_hostage

data.value: The penalty (or bonus) players get for killing a hostage.

data.value: The money bonus a play can get when they respawn (if respawning is enabled).

data.value: How much to damage a player does to himself with his own grenade. Range is from 0 - 1 (with 1 being damage equal to what is done to an enemy).

data.value: How much to reduce damage done to teammates by things other than bullets and grenades. Range is from 0 - 1 (with 1 being damage equal to what is done to an enemy).

data.value: The default melee weapon that the CTs will spawn with. Even if this is blank, a knife will be given. To give a taser, it should look like this: 'weapon_knife weapon_taser'. Remember to set mp_weapons_allow_zeus to 1 if you want to give a taser!

data.value: The default melee weapon that the Ts will spawn with. Even if this is blank, a knife will be given. To give a taser, it should look like this: 'weapon_knife weapon_taser'. Remember to set mp_weapons_allow_zeus to 1 if you want to give a taser!
